title: One-forms, spectral Einstein functionals and the noncommutative residue
abstract: For two one-forms and the Dirac operator, Dabrowski etc. recovered the spectral Einstein functionals by computing their noncommutative residue in Theorem 4.1 \cite{DL}. In this paper, we generalize the results of Dabrowski etc. to the cases of four dimensional spin manifolds with boundary.
